definition: to encounter/to rendezvous/to converge/to meet (a payment)
to hand over/to deliver/to pay (money)/to turn over/to make friends/to intersect (lines)/variant of 跤[jiao1]
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])
China Export Commodities Fair also known as the Canton Fair
abbr. for 美國證券交易委員會|美国证券交易委员会, US Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC)

sentences.english: Now I'd like to brief you on the 106th Canton Fair.
sentences.chinese: 下面我向大家介绍本届广交会的主要情况。

sentences.english: What is the number of real estate tycoons Zhujiaokuai favor of a plus?
sentences.chinese: 到底是什么让众多的地产巨子对住交会青睐有加呢？

sentences.english: Lily: Ann，have you been to the CHTF in Chongqing?
sentences.chinese: 安，你去重庆的高交会了吗？

sentences.english: The first Canton Fair was held in 1957 by the Chinese government.
sentences.chinese: 广交会是中国政府在1957年创办的。

sentences.english: Under such circumstances, the Canton Fair booth price even higher than the number of international exhibitions.
sentences.chinese: 这样来说，广交会的展位价格甚或高于一些国际展会。

sentences.english: The Dong Fang Hotel during the trade fair housed a motley collection of people from every corner of the globe.
sentences.chinese: 广交会期间东方宾馆的客人来自全球各地，肤色各异。

sentences.english: The 106th Canton Fair Phase II is in progress.
sentences.chinese: 第106届广交会二期正在进行中。

sentences.english: The first Guanzhou Autumn Fair was held in 1957.
sentences.chinese: 1957年举办了第一届秋季广交会。

sentences.english: Then a new design of multiple-freedom simulator for RVD is provided.
sentences.chinese: 其次提出一种新的多自由度交会对接仿真器方案。

sentences.english: Have you ever attended SZ Hi-tech Fair?
sentences.chinese: 你参加过深圳高交会吗？

sentences.english: Do you have any good suggestions for the CITM?
sentences.chinese: 您对每年一度的旅交会有什么好的建议？

sentences.english: Two routes of the parade will meet at the China Millennium Monument.
sentences.chinese: 这两列游行队伍将在世纪坛交会。

sentences.english: Years ago, when our children were small, my wife made a business trip to the Spring GuangzhouTrade Fair.
sentences.chinese: 好多年前，我的孩子还小，我太太去春季广交会出差。

sentences.english: Paul haven't paid my dues yet.
The sixth is to desire the special logo for house fair.
sentences.chinese: 六是设计了专门的房交会徽标。

sentences.english: We dropped two members of the club who have not paid their dues.
sentences.chinese: 我们开除了两个不交会费的俱乐部成员。

to flow together/confluence (of rivers, airflow, roads)/(international) cooperation
short name for Chongqing 重慶|重庆[Chong2 qing4]/old name of Jialing river 嘉陵江[Jia1 ling2 jiang1] in Sichuan
Suangcheng county level city in Harbin 哈爾濱|哈尔滨[Ha1 er3 bin1], Heilongjiang
to collect/to compile/to converge/also written 彙集|汇集[hui4 ji2]
lit. warp string in weaving/fig. vertical or north-south lines/to pass through/to cross lengthwise/to pierce (esp. north-south or top-to-bottom)
